always_present.title: Features
always_present.purpose: Summarize the key capabilities and selling points of the project so readers can quickly understand what it offers.

always_present.title: Installation
always_present.purpose: Explain how to set up the project locally or in production, including prerequisites, commands, and configuration needed to get it running.

always_present.title: License
always_present.purpose: State the licensing terms under which the project is distributed, clarifying how it can be used, modified, and shared.

always_present.title: Contributing
always_present.purpose: Describe how others can contribute (bug reports, features, pull requests) and outline any contribution guidelines or processes.

very_common.title: Overview
very_common.purpose: Provide a high-level description of what the project is, what problem it solves, and who it is for.

very_common.title: Usage
very_common.purpose: Show how to use the project once installed, including commands, workflows, or basic examples.

very_common.title: Configuration
very_common.purpose: Document configurable options (environment variables, files, flags) and how to adapt the project to different environments.

very_common.title: Development
very_common.purpose: Guide developers who want to work on the project codebase, covering local dev setup, scripts, and conventions.

very_common.title: Acknowledgments
very_common.purpose: Credit individuals, projects, or organizations that inspired, supported, or directly contributed to the project.

very_common.title: Tech Stack
very_common.purpose: List the main technologies, frameworks, and services used by the project to help readers understand its ecosystem.

very_common.title: Project Structure
very_common.purpose: Outline the layout of the repository or system components so contributors and advanced users can navigate the codebase.

very_common.title: Prerequisites
very_common.purpose: List software, services, or accounts required before installation (e.g., runtimes, databases, external APIs).

optional.title: Screenshots / Demo

optional.title: Why This Project?
